description: This header file defines external API functions for the Value Name Mapper (Vnmo) component within the ANSC framework, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: AnscCreateValueNameMaper
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Value Name Mapper object with provided context handles.

methods.name: AnscVnmoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Vnmo object with specified context handles.

methods.name: AnscVnmoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Vnmo instance.
